text:
MHCC will host a vaccine clinic on April 1st & 2nd in Douglas. The Clinic is from 8:00 am to 11:30 am both days, open to everyone 18 years old and over, and first or second doses are available . Call 307-358-2122 to schedule your shot!
#ItsYourShotWyo #COVID19 #vaccine  #Moderna https://t.co/mlqYlszMWK
